title: Carollzinha
author: Carollzinha
created_time: May 31, 2022, 08:20:44 AMLast edit: March 04, 2025, 12:19:30 AM by Carollzinha
content: Stake.com  Signature CampaignABOUT STAKEProviding a safe and secure betting experience since 2017, Stake.com is a worldwide leader in crypto gambling platforms for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Enjoy a fun and easy way to use crypto to gamble on casino games & sports online with Fiat currencies & 8 accepted cryptos, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and more. Stake offers over 3,000 casino games as well as 17 original games which have a house edge as low as 0.57%. Whether betting on casino games like Blackjack, Roulette, Game Shows or placing wagers on live sports, Stake is an easy choice with its vibrant community, live chat and ongoing promotions to provide an unbeatable gambling experience.RULES♦️ Must wear our signature, avatar & personal text♦️ Must make at least 25 quality posts per week♦️ At least 10 posts per week must be in Gambling and/or Gambling Discussion♦️ If the minimum posts requirements are not fulfilled the payrates will be half♦️ Not reaching the minimum posts too often will get you removed from the campaign♦️ You must be an active forum user in daily basis (or at least 5 days a week)*♦️ If you do not usually post at Gambling & Gambling Discussion sections please do not apply for this campaign♦️ Posts must be constructive and on topic♦️ 150 characters minimum. No links & overusing punctuation will count♦️ Posts being generated by AI will not count for your current payment & may cause you to be removed from the campaign with no pay♦️ If you receive negative trust while enrolled we reserve the right to check & kick you out from the campaign with no pay♦️ You are free to include your own Stake affiliate code to your signature but you may not advertise any site other than Stake while enrolled♦️ Posts in Signature Campaigns, Bounty Threads, Games & Rounds, Off topic, Lending, Auctions, Beginners and Help & Archival will not count♦️ Posts at any section where signatures are disabled will not count for obvious reasons♦️ Paid posts at Local Boards are limited to 10 per week♦️ Members with more than 1 account in this campaign will be kicked out with no pay♦️ Every member of this campaign must be in our Telegram group for payment infos & news♦️ After your acceptance in this campaign please send a direct message on Telegram to @Carollzinha♦️ No application out of this topic will be accepted. Bitcointalk PMs & Telegram messages before your acceptance will be ignored.*by active members we dont mean those that will do a lot of posts in average then drop it to just a few in the day after to reach the min of 5 days requirement (i.e: 7, 9, 9, 10, 2 posts).. the same applies for the inverse situation (i.e: 3-3-2-4-2-13 posts). In both situations we can see that these 2 & 13 are totally out of the user average, both done to complete the minimum day or minimum post requirement (respectively). To avoid such issues, be active.If you are Full Member+, is still wearing our old Stake animated avatar & would like to join our campaign feel free to drop me a private message.CURRENT CAMPAIGN MEMBERS, PLEASE UPDATE YOUR SIGNATURE & PERSONAL TEXT ASAPPrevious Campaign ThreadPAYMENT INFORMATION♦️ Payments are sent in Bitcoin, every Tuesday, directly to the user Stake’s account♦️ The payment limit is $125/week (+$35 if win the bonus) per member of this campaign♦️ The conversion from USD to BTC will be made at the time the payments list is sent out (normally from 2 to 3am GMT)♦️ If the minimum posts requirements were not reached, the payrates will be half for that week.Payrates:HERO:♦️ Up to 25 posts: $2.00 per post♦️ From 26 posts on: $0.75 per post + 20% extra for posts at Gambling Section (including Stake & Primedice main threads)LEGENDARY:♦️ Up to 25 posts: $2.50 per post♦️ From 26 posts on: $0.90 per post + 20% extra for posts at Gambling Section (including Stake & Primedice main threads)EXTRA BONUS♦️ Every week we will be picking the 4 best quality posters to win $35 each.♦️ You have to reach the minimum campaign requirements.♦️ Only Gambling section posts will will count for this bonus.♦️ The more you post, the higher your chances.------------Jan/02/2023 Update: from today on the 2 with the best rating will be receiving the bonus + everyone with a rating of 7.5+ will be put in a list to join a giveaway to pick the other 2 to get the bonus------------A week runs from Monday 6pm to next Monday 5:59:59pm GMT. Posts after that will count for the next week.The post counts system is a basic last week final post count - the current post counting at your profile at 00:00 Tuesday (GMT) so post at self moderated sections at your own risk. (Note: in case of a massive posts deletion your last highest post count will stay as final post count until you can get it back to positive)HOW TO APPLYCode:Bitcointalk Username:Profile Link:Post Weekly earnings are $50 for Hero and $56.25 for Legendary, excluding bonuses. There isn't much difference between this and the previous thread. Tbh. This is my doubt The difference is now 62.5 USD for 25 posts for Legendaries while it was before 56.25 USD,it is a normal boost I would say and aiming at lowering the spam because with a simple 25 posts now the Legendary get near 70 USD,if they will post more they will get more.Mostly the users here are not spammy from what I have seen as I am here since December/January and users are strictly checked before joining here.I also changed everything as required,the sig and text.

Weekly earnings are $50 for Hero and $56.25 for Legendary, excluding bonuses. There isn't much difference between this and the previous thread. Tbh. This is my doubt The difference is now 62.5 USD for 25 posts for Legendaries while it was before 56.25 USD,it is a normal boost I would say and aiming at lowering the spam because with a simple 25 posts now the Legendary get near 70 USD,if they will post more they will get more.Mostly the users here are not spammy from what I have seen as I am here since December/January and users are strictly checked before joining here.I also changed everything as required,the sig and text.this may be viewed differently. I did not track whether this campaign tolerates spam, but this extra bonus can be considered as an incentive to spam. more posts imply bigger chances of winning additional bonuses, is not in line with insisting on quality posts.just my opinion.Quote from: Carollzinha on May 31, 2022, 08:20:44 AMEXTRA BONUS♦️ The more you post, the higher your chances.
